item.title: I'm mad
item.dc:creator: @ginger_ninja ginger_ninja
item.description:
@ginger_ninja wrote:

ehh, i can’t seem to get this command to work, can anyone help?

if (command.startsWith("noob") && playerRights >= 0) { if (playerLevel[1] >= 50) { if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000000) == false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough money to buy this."); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000000) == true)) { addItem(1149,1); addItem(3140,1); addItem(4087,1); addItem(1187,1); addItem(1704,1); addItem(4151,1); addItem(5699,1); addItem(4588,1); addItem(3205,1); addItem(1378,1); addItem(1306,1); addItem(4213,1); addItem(4154,1); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot995), 10000000); } } }

thanks…
